text: Age of Mythology is a real-time strategy computer game made by Ensemble Studios. The game has an expansion to it named Age of Mythology: The Titans. Age of Mythology is a spinoff of the Age of Empires game series. == Other websites == *Official Site *Age of Mythology at HeavenGames.com Category:2002 video games Category:Action-adventure games Category:Esports games Category:MacOS games Category:Real-time strategy video games Category:Video games based on Chinese mythology Category:Video games based on Egyptian mythology Category:Video games based on Greek mythology Category:Video games based on multiple mythologies Category:Video games based on Norse mythology Category:Video games developed in the United States Category:Video games set in Atlantis Category:Windows games
title: Age of Mythology
